A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hugely disaapointing. I agree with most of the fans criticisms. I liked that they wanted to take it in a new direction- but It raised themes then dropped them without following them through. Kylo Ren is an interesting conflicted character - but without a baddie who you don't know how you can defeat there is jeopardy\, no stakes. Any moments approaching something meaningful there was a joke that took you out of it\, Rey is a Mary Sue. Cannot understand why the critics liked it! I think in time this will be seen an a huge misjudgement on the part of Disney- they'll lose their fanbase- as a lifelong fan I don't want anything more to do with it.
